storyInfo: The local gang led by the Rat King and the taken-over Mafia launch a fierce attack against Penguin Logistics. Mostima personally contains the Rat King, and Bison finally overcomes his mental block to join the fight.

attributes.content: Grandpa Rat~!
attributes.name: Little Girl

attributes.content: Why are you out here all alone, little one? And your face is filthy. Were you crawling through air ducts again?
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Hehe, Uncle Ho gave this to me, Grandpa Rat! Uncle Ho said I'm small and I run fast, and if I got this to you quick enough he'd give me a yogurt. You have to tell him I did it!
attributes.name: Little Girl

attributes.content: Don't worry, Grandpa will tell him. Now you run along.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Thanks, Grandpa! Bye byee~!
attributes.name: Little Girl

attributes.content: Something wrong, Uncle?
attributes.name: Seemingly Ordinary Resident

attributes.content: Do you recall those Siracusans who came looking for us some time ago? The rest of their 'Family' has since come to Lungmen.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Should I contact our spy?
attributes.name: Seemingly Ordinary Resident

attributes.content: No need for that. Let us bide our time. They will come to us on their own.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: What for?
attributes.name: Seemingly Ordinary Resident

attributes.content: To survive in Lungmen.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: But it's not like they need anyone's permission for that. They might as well take a meeting with a Catastrophe.
attributes.name: Seemingly Ordinary Resident

attributes.content: If Catastrophes could speak, maybe we wouldn't need to fight each other.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: ...it's just like you said, Mr. Rat King.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: It's Lungmen. Lungmen's got its own rules Wei Yenwu agreed to a decade ago. We ain't about to go breakin' 'em.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: But you're the executive. That's why we're here to pay our respects.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: ...You want to wipe out Penguin Logistics, and take their place.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Exactly.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: You don't know much about them, Sicilians. This deal would not be of benefit to you.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Hmph.
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: (Gambino!)
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Are you tryin' to tell us we can't win? Mr. 'Rat King'?
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: Winning and losing are words that have no place in a business discussion. No wonder you had to flee Siracusa. You are no match for that woman.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: You insult the Family?
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: Quiet, Gambino! We're after Penguin Logistics here...
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: You need only follow the rules. I am not here to protect Penguin Logistics.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: What do you mean?
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Penguin Logistics is on its face a legal entity. The only thing that can protect it is the ironclad law of Lungmen.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: But they do, from time to time, cause offense to various stakeholders. And they never take it appropriately seriously.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: But bear in mind, Sicilians, you must never overstep your bounds.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: An unconventional order is not the same as disorder. Siracusans should understand this more than anyone. But you must never again bring trouble to these old bones of mine. Promise me that.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: ...I understand.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: There are so many more stars in Lungmen this time of year. So many more than you'd think.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: The tea on the table has gone cold, hasn't it?
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: This is Uncle's... Hey, we're on the clock.
attributes.name: Passerby

attributes.content: I'm not deaf. I'm on it. Once I'm done let's go get tea.
attributes.name: Passerby

attributes.content: Looks like it's our turn.
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: We paid our respects, put down our crossbows, and made sure not to hurt any civilians.
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: ...all nice and proper-like under the new rules.
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: So we're surrounded? Six or so deep on all sides?
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Oh, like a roll cake?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: The Rat King is the boss of the slums. Of course his claws and teeth are everywhere.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Why didn't you say so earlier?
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: I thought he was just an urban legend. And I never imagined he'd actually be a rat. Who would take a nickname like that?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: With all them people around, it's too hard to tell who's after us and who's a passerby!
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: We don't have a lot of room to act here.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: What do we do?
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: You're always asking what to do. Don't you ever think for yourself?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Here they come.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Here you are. I think you can make out the situation from up here.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Your friends are locked in a life or death struggle. Aren't you going to help them?
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: From what I've heard of you, I never thought you'd be so heavy handed.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: I don't share every last thought of mine with the young people.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Sure enough. I always forget what kind of person you are.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Many have forgotten as much. And they all ended up six feet deep in an unmarked grave. You're already among the luckiest.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: You killed the boss. You think that'll just blow over?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Heh heh. It's all very clear to me.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: The owner of Penguin Logistics has always acted so prideful, as if above everyone else. But Lungmen is changing. She cannot allow this to continue.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: They needed to be taught a lesson. And a very harsh one at that.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: There's always a comeuppance when you bite the hand that feeds.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: You've done so much with the help of Penguin Logistics...
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Wait, were you planning this from the very beginning?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Who knows?
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Couldn't be. Your whole act is way too good. Or, at least it's better than mine.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Heh heh... you really are impressively clever.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: The flames react to your will. Will you put me in the ground tonight?
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: How could I?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: I respect my elders, and care for the young.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Mostima!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Woah, Exusiai! We're the ones who are surrounded. Don't break formation!
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Hold on! I'm coming!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: They're all mixed in with the normal folk. This ain't no way to fight!
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: What is going on...?
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Bison, don't just sit there like a bump on a log. Yer in my way! Move it!
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: They're all... it's all... how can I...?
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: ...I can't.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: All right. If that's how it has to be, we'll do it their way.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Can you hear me?
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: A message? For who?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Careful.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Focus, Sora.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: O- okay!
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: You're here, aren't you? You always have been.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Young Master... I...
attributes.name: Butler

attributes.content: I don't blame you. I'm sure it was all my father's machinations. But right here, right now, I need you to help me.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: ...Of course. Give me your instructions, Young Master.
attributes.name: Butler

attributes.content: You really think this is a time for instructions?
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Just send them flying.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: To hear such an order from the mouth of the Young Master...
attributes.name: Butler

attributes.content: Allow me to advocate for the Master of the House and ask: why?
attributes.name: Butler

attributes.content: Who gives a shit why? Out of my way, Croissant!
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Ooh...
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Haaagh!
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: He- he knocked 'em into the air?!  That ain't how I do things!
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Hm... the Master of the House should be pleased with this result. But should the Young Master continue in this way... I worry he may find himself corrupted by Penguin Logistics.
attributes.name: Butler

attributes.content: No... I mustn't obstruct the Young Master any further. If this is the course he believes is correct, then so be it.
attributes.name: Butler

attributes.content: You little punk! I'll put you in the ground!
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: He dodged?!
attributes.name: Mafioso A

attributes.content: Yowch! Something knocked my club away!
attributes.name: Mafioso B

attributes.content: Careful, they got a sniper!
attributes.name: Mafioso A

attributes.content: Outta my way!
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: ...the intensity is under control, but you haven't moved a single step. Isn't that a little unreasonable?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: When one stands unmoving, that does not mean one is relaxed.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Is there anything in Lungmen that can defeat you?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Yes. 'Lungmen' can.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Ooh, what a crafty answer.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: I go to the park to exercise, every morning, without fail. It's important to stay active as I get older.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: And are these morning exercises effective?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: You have to add in a bit of life experience.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: How are the two Siracusans?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: How are they indeed.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: ...I really wonder how many of these invisible problems you quietly solve each and every day.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: How many times have you tricked these people into massacring each other rather than let them dip their toes into Lungmen?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: I don't recall. All I can tell you is that regardless of how many corpses piled up in the sewers, there are always far more people who strive to survive.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Mostima! I'm here to
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: That's far enough. You guys, go help the Dai Lo.
attributes.name: Seemingly Ordinary Resident

attributes.content: Right!
attributes.name: Mafioso & Passerby

attributes.content: You won't get away with this.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: A sniper? The princeling's bodyguard?
attributes.name: Seemingly Ordinary Resident

attributes.content: Outta my way!
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: You're just a regular Messenger. You don't belong here.
attributes.name: Seemingly Ordinary Resident

attributes.content: Messenger? That's right, I'm a Messenger. But the ladies behind me and in front of me, making all that noise? They're Messengers too.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: You're not like Texas and the others. You should leave this battle. Get yourself home safe.
attributes.name: Seemingly Ordinary Resident

attributes.content: ...you done?
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Nng! You have some fight in you!
attributes.name: Seemingly Ordinary Resident

attributes.content: Just do it!
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Right!
attributes.name: Bison
